duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage a sales territory and implement strategies aligned with established sales and marketing plans.
Communicate with new and existing academic, pharmaceutical, and biotechnology accounts through various channels.
Leverage Customer Relationship Management System to capture qualified leads and build a territory database.
Consistently achieve or exceed the territory sales plan by maintaining existing business and developing incremental business.
Build a pipeline for long-term sales momentum and develop enduring relationships with key opinion leaders.
Review sales performance by territory and by business line, along with analysis.
Work effectively as a team contributor on all assignments, as well as independently.
May be required to work overtime occasionally and perform other assigned duties.
Travel extensively as needed to build long-term business relationships.
Utilize knowledge of advanced translational/clinical workflows and proficiency with MS Office Suite and Salesforce.com.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Biology with in-depth knowledge of genomics, cell biology, and epigenetics (Advanced degree in science and/or business is a plus)
